name: Day of the Dead: When robots disobey (Alpha)
name_original: Day of the Dead: When robots disobey (Alpha)
description:
Stephen Hawking has warned us not to trust the artificial intelligence, but we trusted it anyway and we never knew what outcome there would be.

A mysterious computer virus released by terrorist hackers and mafia has infected and started reprogramming all of the artificial intelligence that are linked to their maintenance, cyborgs got mysteriously brainwashed by the virus as no one ever knew of what this virus is capable of.

General has ordered the military to destroy as many robots as possible as they may cause even more damage to the whole country, you must find the terrorist base and destroy it.

It is believed that more brainwashed cyborgs are being recruited into the mafia and enemy robots are being constructed even more as they may attempt to invade the whole country and start enslaving the whole government.

it is speculated that brainwashing effect from the virus on cyborgs is irreversible and infected cyborgs may have to be euthanized.

your mission is to find all blackboxes containing parts of the special component known as the blue energy core that is capable of destroying anything it touches, cargo plane was taken down by terrorists and blackboxes are scattered in 5 maps, the enemy can't open them without special tools so they can only guard them.

But don't expect this game to be that easy, some enemies can kill you in seconds.

good luck.
